item.title: View Images on A Remote Machine
item.description: First connect to remate machine with port-forwarding: ssh -L 8000:localhost:8000 usr@machine.cs.school.edu, cd to project directory, then serve the whole directory with python3 -m http.server &. Use a web browser to connect to http://0.0.0.0:8000.
